Class ECGAnalysis

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.medicine.cardiology.ECGAnalysis
public class ECGAnalysis extends Object
Basic ECG (Electrocardiogram) analysis utilities.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • heartRateFromRR

      public static double heartRateFromRR(double rrIntervalMs)
      Calculates heart rate from R-R intervals. HR = 60 / RR_interval_seconds
      Parameters:
      rrIntervalMs - R-R interval in milliseconds
      Returns:
      Heart rate in beats per minute

    • averageHeartRate

      public static double averageHeartRate(double[] rPeakTimesMs)
      Calculates average heart rate from multiple R-peak timestamps.

    • hrvSDNN

      public static double hrvSDNN(double[] rrIntervalsMs)
      Heart rate variability (SDNN) - standard deviation of NN intervals.

    • hrvRMSSD

      public static double hrvRMSSD(double[] rrIntervalsMs)
      RMSSD - root mean square of successive differences. Important HRV metric.

    • qtcBazett

      public static double qtcBazett(double qtIntervalMs, double rrIntervalMs)
      QTc calculation (Bazett's formula). QTc = QT / sqrt(RR)
      Parameters:
      qtIntervalMs - QT interval in ms
      rrIntervalMs - RR interval in ms
      Returns:
      Corrected QT interval

    • qtcFridericia

      public static double qtcFridericia(double qtIntervalMs, double rrIntervalMs)
      QTc using Fridericia formula (better for fast/slow HR). QTc = QT / RR^(1/3)

    • isQTcProlonged

      public static boolean isQTcProlonged(double qtcMs, boolean isMale)
      Checks if QTc is prolonged. Normal: invalid input: '<'440ms male, invalid input: '<'460ms female

    • detectRPeaks

      public static int[] detectRPeaks(double[] ecgSignal, double threshold)
      Simple R-peak detection (threshold-based). Returns indices of detected R-peaks.
